mapper.sql: select gNum, gName, gStartDate, gMaker, gPublisher, gServiceType, gPlatform, gGenre, gHomepage, gRating, gIntroduce from gamedb
mapper.insert: insert into gamedb ( gNum, gName, gStartDate, gMaker, gPublisher, gServiceType, gPlatform, gGenre, gHomepage, gRating, gIntroduce ) values ( #{gNum}, #{gName}, #{gStartDate}, #{gMaker}, #{gPublisher}, #{gServiceType}, #{gPlatform}, #{gGenre}, #{gHomepage}, #{gRating}, #{gIntroduce} )
mapper.update: update gamedb set gName = #{gName}, gStartDate = #{gStartDate}, gMaker = #{gMaker}, gPublisher = #{gPublisher}, gServiceType = #{gServiceType}, gPlatform = #{gPlatform}, gGenre = #{gGenre}, gHomepage = #{gHomepage}, gRating = #{gRating}, gIntroduce = #{gIntroduce} where gNum = #{gNum}
